entity_groups.name: Variants
entity_groups.description: Genetic variants including SNPs, InDels, structural variants, and CNVs

entity_groups.name: Genes
entity_groups.description: Genes, genomic sequences, and related annotations

entity_groups.name: Epigenomics
entity_groups.description: Epigenetic modifications such as DNA methylation, histone marks, and chromatin states

entity_groups.name: Transcriptomics
entity_groups.description: Transcripts, isoforms, and RNA expression profiles

entity_groups.name: Proteins
entity_groups.description: Proteins, isoforms, peptides, and functional annotations

entity_groups.name: Metabolomics
entity_groups.description: Metabolites, small molecules, and biochemical pathways

entity_groups.name: Diseases
entity_groups.description: Disease entities, classifications, and associated phenotypes

entity_groups.name: Pathways
entity_groups.description: Biological pathways, networks, and molecular interactions

entity_groups.name: Gene Ontology
entity_groups.description: GO terms for molecular function, biological process, and cellular component

entity_groups.name: Chemicals
entity_groups.description: Chemical compounds, drugs, and experimental substances

entity_groups.name: Clinical Trials
entity_groups.description: Clinical trial metadata, interventions, and outcomes

entity_groups.name: Microbiome
entity_groups.description: Microbial species, communities, and host interactions

entity_groups.name: Phenotypes
entity_groups.description: Observable traits, phenotypic ontologies (HPO), and GWAS associations

entity_groups.name: Cell Types
entity_groups.description: Cellular taxonomy and single-cell expression atlases
